name: HP FQ983AA#ABA Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [Get smooth, responsive tracking on most surfaces with the high-precision laser sensor, Control the sensitivity for different applications by selecting various DPI settings (400, 800, 1200, 1600), Flip between documents and adjust the mouse sensitivity with the function button on top, Navigate right and left, in addition to scrolling up and down, with the four-way tilt wheel, Grab it and go: this travel-size mouse is simple to pack and does not need batteries, Go in style with the black finish, high-gloss silver accents, and curved edges, Monitor the battery level and mouse sensitivity with the LED on top]
